inclusion.criterion: examination, blood chemistry analysis and a chest X-ray were taken
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: questionnaires were used to evaluate the effects on health care resource use outside the hospital
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: quality of life was determined with the short form health survey questionnaire
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: additional questionnaires were used to measure the effects of an early discharge on the workload for family members
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: treatment failures were defined as death, clinical deterioration or hospitalization at day 28 of the study
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: microbiological analyses were performed on sputum samples and blood samples
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: economic evaluation was used to calculate direct medical costs associated with the treatment in both study groups
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients with cystic fibrosis were excluded
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of colonization with Gram negative bacteria due to structural damage to the respiratory tract was an exclusion criterion
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis, but no other exclusion criteria mentioned.
